Actions.OnCtrlClickCell: ChooseCellInsert OR ShowLink OR DeselectCell OR SelectCell OR DeselectRow OR SelectRow,1
Actions.OnShiftClickCell: ChooseCellReplaceAll OR FocusCellRange OR InvertCellRangeFirst OR InvertRowRangeFirst,1
Actions.OnClickPanelColSelect: DeselectCol OR SelectCol OR DeselectColCells OR SelectColCells
Actions.OnDragRow: ChooseCellsReplaceAll OR FocusCells OR DragSelected OR DragRow OR InvertCellsFirst OR InvertRowsFirst
Actions.OnCtrlDragRow: ChooseCellsInsert OR InvertCellsFirst OR DragSelectedCopy OR DragCopy OR InvertRowsFirst
Actions.OnDragGantt: ResizeGanttMain OR ResizeGanttRun OR MoveGanttMainFirst OR MoveGanttRun OR MoveGanttFlag OR MoveGanttPoint OR MoveGanttConstraint OR MoveGanttLine OR CreateGanttBar OR DragGanttDependency OR 1
Actions.OnRightDragGantt: SelectGanttRunRect OR ResizeGanttRun OR MoveGanttRun OR MoveGanttMain OR Scroll OR 1
Actions.OnCtrlClickGantt: DeleteGanttConstraint OR DeleteGanttFlag OR DeleteGanttPoint OR DeleteGanttMain OR DeleteGanttRun OR DeleteGanttRunContainerOnly OR DeleteGanttDependency OR DeleteGanttBase OR DeleteGanttFinish OR 1
Actions.OnDblClickGantt: SelectGanttRun OR SelectGanttRunContainer OR EditGanttFlag OR EditGanttResource OR EditGanttText OR EditGanttRun OR EditGanttRunTip OR EditGanttDependencyLag OR NewGanttMilestone OR NewGanttFlag OR NewGanttPoint
Actions.OnDrag1Row: ChooseCellsReplaceAll OR FocusCells OR DragSelected OR DragRow
Actions.OnDrag1Gantt: ResizeGanttMain OR ResizeGanttRun OR MoveGanttMainFirst OR MoveGanttRun OR MoveGanttFlag OR MoveGanttPoint OR MoveGanttConstraint OR MoveGanttLine OR CreateGanttBar OR DragGanttDependency
Actions.OnEnter: ChangeBool OR ChangeRadioRightCycle OR StartEdit OR ShowLink OR ShowDefaults OR ShowFile OR ShowCalendar OR EditGanttResource
Actions.OnCtrlDown: ShowDefaults OR ShowFile OR ShowFilterMenu OR ShowCalendar OR ButtonClick

Toolbar.TextIndentOnClick: Grid.CanEditStyle() AND (!Grid.EditMode OR Row==Grid.ERow AND Col==Grid.ECol) ? StartEditCellAccept||1 : 1

GB.Name: English
GB.Tip: UK English, differs from US only in date and currency formats

CA.Name: Français
CA.Tip: Canadian French, differs from French mainly in date formats; fully translated

IT.Name: Italiano
IT.Tip: Italian, translated only TreeGrid, not the example

ES.Name: Español
ES.Tip: Spanish, translated only TreeGrid, not the example

PT.Name: Português
PT.Tip: Portugal Portuguese, translated only TreeGrid, not the example

HR.Name: Hrvatski
HR.Tip: Croatian, fully translated except Gantt example
